website_summaries.verdict: A great option if you're looking for an affordable lamp that can double as a decorative or storage piece.
pros: Lamp has a small footprint, but puts out a lot of light
Pull chain allows you to turn it on and off easily
Comes with two built-in storage shelves
cons: Some customers find the assembly to be difficult

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Perfect for us! Def recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 lamps which worked perfect along each side of my bed since we had a limited amount of space to work with and also wanted to have something to set our phone, water, or a book on at night. Putting them together took about 20-30 mins while watching a football game. All of the parts were included and they look just like what the picture shows. We use LED lights in them which work perfect and even if we have only 1 on at night we can still both read etc as there is plenty of light! We are very happy with our purchase and would recommend them to anyone looking for a similar product!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Modern lamp-thumbs up for the price
customer_reviews.text: The price is right. It's a beautiful lamp. It reminded me of a Japanese lamp style because of the shape, rectangular box wood frame, and a contrasting white natural color shade. It provided soft, indirect light for the room. I have a small-medium sized living room and it just fitted in. It's easy to assemble. Im very pleased with the purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Lifeisgood23

customer_reviews.title: Bright, soft light, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a floor lamp for quite a while, and I'm glad I found this one. It's so much sturdier than the typical tall skinny pole lights that have a round or square base. Higher-wattage bulbs can be used in this lamp, which is great because I only need one lamp in my living room. I like that the shade softens the harshness of the bulbs, and makes the room feel really cozy. Plus the shelves are great for knick knacks/books/picture frames/etc. Great lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a lamp with shelves to tuck next to a Murphy bed in our guest room. This is nice quality for the low cost. The pull-chain is much easier to use than a cord switch and has a nice feel and look to it, with a silver ball at the end. We saw a similar lamp at our big box store for the same price, but that one seemed to be more cheaply made. This assembled easily. You just need to insert some threaded rods into holes, and that is easier to do if you wear a work glove to protect your hand.
customer_reviews.author: ZvilleJ

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to find that several of the wood "legs" used to assemble this lamp came splintered or knicked. I wouldn't call the price tag "cheap" and would have expected better for the money. The directions are also pointless, easier to put it together using instincts and the picture than reading the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen D Vorrier

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, durability poor
customer_reviews.text: This looks beautiful, don't get me wrong. It fit perfectly the needs of the room. However, we've had it 8 months and the pull chain broke off after normal amount of use. Disappointing because now we have to figure out a way to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: sliver1081

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are lame
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are lame. Four poles are smaller than the rest. I did not become aware of this until I was finished. There should be a warning in RED to make sure we use the short poles last. When I opened box, I saw those poles on top and started installing because I unwittingly believed I should start with those poles. I had to destroy the aesthetic caps in order to uninstall the shelf lamp...ugh. Also, some of the stain was not thorough because I could see wood. For $75 I expected a bit more from this product. Otherwise, it looks okay.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Peeling Paint
customer_reviews.text: The paint of one of the shelves is peeling off. It was a small corner when I first got it and now It's flaking all over the floor and is slowly working its way across the entire piece.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Price gouging, price up 41% in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: These are aesthetically nice, although cheap and fragile. In May 2017 I paid $44 per unit and now I need to replace one and I see they want 41% more for this item than it cost less than a year ago. What gives with that?
customer_reviews.author: Block Google Spiders

customer_reviews.title: This lamp was very easy to build
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was very easy to build, despite the poor instructions. I've had it for over a year and it holds several heavy books and illuminates well. What kind of bulb you choose to use will be key in weather you get more of a white or yellow light, the screen itself is a cream color. You do need to have a couple of heavy items on it to weigh it down a bit, while it doesn't wobble, it is very light weight and would be easy to tip over if you have kids or pets. The material is not of the highest quality, but decent for the price, and overall it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this is not worth the price paid. I wasn't expecting much for something I have to put together, but Ikea is better than this. It may work better on wood floors, but I have carpet in my bedroom and it's not sturdy at all. I only use it to place my phone at night while it charges. Also, I put a pretty low watt light bulb in it and after 3 weeks it burned out. Save your money and time and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: leej

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE LAMP. No seriously
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LAMP. No seriously, this lamp is pretty sweet. Easy to put together, sleek looking, good material. Structure is solid. Buy this lamp if you're sophisticated af.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Blackard

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty good in my living room. It wasn't the easiest thing to assemble. The actual putting it together is simple, but the instructions are terrible. Just know you start by putting the regular screws in 1st in the base pointing up and then you'll fly through it. The directions show a lot of extra stuff that I don't think was labeled very good. Anyways, the actual lamp itself looks good. I have one of those energy efficient light bulbs in it that is 44 watts but looks like 100. It looks pretty good and no issues with it. I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: JoshM5683

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture. Very well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Great furniture. Very well packaged. Only one of the small rods was not cut properly (the edge was at an angle). However, I placed that piece at the back of the lamp and it was hidden very well. Overall, in reality, I would give this lamp a 4.7 out of 5 in terms of aesthetics, quality, and functionality. The cutting of the rods could have been a bit better, but for what is out there in the market, this is by far the best you can get for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Ash N.

customer_reviews.title: Looks splendid and so amazing lit!
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to assemble. I love that these lamps have shelves. The pull chain is easy to use, unlike some lamps I have had previously. The shade diffuses the light well, and also projects it upward. Cutouts in the lamp base allows light onto the top shelf. Overall, I'm excited to have these lamps. My only very minor complaint was that the lamp cord was not designed to run along a pole to hide the cord, and the ties that came with the lamp were FAR too short, so I had to devise my own ties. My living room looks amazing with these lamps!
customer_reviews.author: Tygermoon

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the cord
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is very attractive. It was easy to put together -- only took about 45 minutes to put together. I did it myself (I'm a senior citizen). I appreciate the previous commenter who recommended inserting the shade before putting the top on. That helped I think. Anyway, the only problems I have are with the cord: 1) why couldn't it be black? It would less visible that way; and 2) the plastic strip included to hold it close to the post is a joke. It took forever to thread them (old eyes) and then they broke. I wound up using needle point yarn.
customer_reviews.author: lgs

customer_reviews.title: Great Light
customer_reviews.text: Nice glowing light. Definitely not bright enough to read by, but light up a college dorm room size area nicely. Setup was very easy, even though the instructions were a little lacking in detail. It is awesome that I was able to buy this on amazon and have it primed shipped to me. Cool product, definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: James R Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great look, fun
customer_reviews.text: Great look, fun, and versatile shelves. I was hoping for a bronze color but it is very black. Looks kind of Japanese. You do have to take some time to assemble with 16 screws. If you aren't into assembly, do not buy this lamp (it comes in a tiny box full of little sticks)
customer_reviews.author: CountryMom

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 but only 1 actually worked
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2, one worked the other didn't (the electrical wire was not attached to the light socket). Seems you have a lot of trouble with these light sockets. I live in a country with 220V electrical appliances, but at my residence I have 110V, so it's a real disappointment ). On the bright side, they look quite nice. If both had actually worked, I would have given them 4 or 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, very cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Nice, very cheap material, a bit over priced, but still works if you keep a clean and zero animal/ kid house.
customer_reviews.author: Almelo

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Not the highest quality, e.g., the shade is paper, not fabric, and the finish on the wood is thin, but a good value for the price. From several feet away. looks like a more expensive lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Howard K.

customer_reviews.title: There is a nice chain that easily switches light off and on
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lamp for the relaxation room in our apartment but most seemed to be too bright. This lamp is exactly what I was looking for! There is a nice chain that easily switches light off and on. The only thing I did not like about this lamp is that two of the wooden poles were slightly chipped -- They must have chipped before packaging because they were individually wrapped. Oh well, it's nothing a little Sharpie couldn't fix! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp! Each shelf holds 5 lbs, so I've got a few bottles of wine sitting on them. Looks great in the corner. Have 100w equivalent cfl in it. Wish I could find a brighter one as the shade is pretty opaque.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Novello

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp for the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp for the purpose. It was a relative pain to unpack and disassemble because of so many parts so I killed an hour putting two of these together. They work well. Fit and finish are acceptable given the price. They're not high end by any means but they're decorative enough they look nice in the theater room where I put them.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is beautiful. While it is cheaply made and not worth ...
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is beautiful. While it is cheaply made and not worth the price, it IS pretty. HOWEVER - the first box that arrived, I put the lamp together to find that the light itself did not work. I sent it back and got another, (packing completely intact) and the light bulb part again was broken. When I checked the reviews a second time, I saw that most people had this problem with it. I was very upset with this and am awaiting my 3rd replacement. Though this is disappointing of the company, they deliver the replacements overnight. If you are an inpatient person, do not buy this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Tayla

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I did not have high expectations even after reading the positive reviews, but it turns out they were right. The lamp adds a touch of elegance without standing out too much. Very nice and very easy to assemble. Update: My chain also broke like a few other reviewers. I emailed Adesso customer service and they emailed me quickly saying they had the replacement piece and would ship it out the next day. I received it in a timely manner and it does appear to be a beefed up version so hopefully it will hold up. Very good customer service and I still really like the overall look of the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Paris Tx Guy

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is a little flimsy and not sturdy, but it looks great and is wonderful for ...
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is a little flimsy and not sturdy, but it looks great and is wonderful for the price. The cord for the lamp hangs down the middle though. They give you small zip-ties to hold the cord against the lamp, but I found these were too small, so I used some thicker black ones. They blend right in. Also, when I pull the metal cord to turn on the light, I don't feel like I am going to break it, which I was worried about since it is not the best quality. Overall, it is a great lamp and I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Not too difficult to build. Need to pay attention to the parts and their position. Make sure to tighten up the screws very well. Better to use a power tool for this job. Screwdriver will be difficult to get tight and you'll wear out your wrist. Will be wobbly if not tightened well
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good looks, but not for perfectionists.
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, it looks great from afar and with a 40-watt CFL it's able to provide ample ambient lighting for a mid sized room. You can get the $20, pre-fab/pre-assembled floor lamps at the local hardware store, but let's be honest they're pretty blah looking. This does look good. But if you are a perfectionist that can't stand if things don't align perfectly, you're probably going to end up returning this lamp. If you aren't bothered by that sort of thing (and only under close examination would this be noticed), you'll do just fine with this one. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Canuck

customer_reviews.title: Missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: ordered a set and one of the lamps came missing a piece. Thankfully it still will function, I just had to get creative to hide the fact that it had a missing piece
customer_reviews.author: Jana Klepsch

customer_reviews.title: this is a great product that is easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a great product that is easy to assemble. I will only say that on carpet, it is a little wobbly. On a hard surface, I'm sure it is more stable. That being said, my wife and I love these. They work great as end tables for our bed room.
customer_reviews.author: A & J

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice lamp. It looks nice when it's all setup
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice lamp. It looks nice when it's all setup, and it's better than say the Fred Meyer imitator version (it costs more though, too). The baseboards are nice and thick, but the legs between the shelves seem kinda... meh. Some of my screw inserts in them were angled, which was kind of obnoxious to deal with when assembling the next level, and while they have a nice smooth looking finish, the corners on them flaked off in a couple big long black splinters if I wasn't paying attention to how I held them.
customer_reviews.author: Reakain

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. I recently downsized and needed items that serve multiple purposes. This fit the bill. I built it while I watched TV and didn't need more than a screw driver. Nothing was damaged. It looked like the pictures. It is narrow - which I wanted, but it if you need large shelves it might not be the right model for you. There are some with wider shelves or some with drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine-S4

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and practical
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is great. It offers shelves for our overflowing book collection, and looks very nice in the living room. The first one I got did not light up. I realized this after I put it together, which sucked, but entirely my fault. I returned to Amazon, which was easy, and got a replacement, which came quickly. I tested the light before I put the thing together this time, and it was fine. We've been using it for several months without any problems. Very elegant and nice, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cemile Guldal

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is just what I needed to fill the dark spots of my bedroom with light. Assembly was a breeze and everything needed was included. I'm using a GE 26 Watt Energy Smart 100 Watt Replacement bulb on it and it's very bright. The lamp also has 3 shelves which can be used for displaying pictures and such. If the lamp has to be placed in an out-of-reach location, then I suggest getting the Skylink WS-100/WS-100N Wireless Remote Control. Plug the remote control into the electric outlet, the lamp into the Wireless Remote Control, and you have a beautiful lamp that can be turned on/off from any place in the room.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Everything went together pretty easy and all the parts were there
customer_reviews.text: Everything went together pretty easy and all the parts were there. My only complaint is that the paint has a chance of rubbing off when twisting the supports on. Toss some sort of heavy visually appealing item on the shelf/stand at the bottom and it's sturdy enough for the shelves to have a little more weight without worry of toppling over.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar D

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Shelf Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love the look and deign of this lamp. I felt it was very simple to put together. Love how it looks in my den. The shelves add a perfect touch. The finish is black wood grain design which is perfect. I used a 60 watt LED bulb and lights up beautifully. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan & Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these for either side of my TV. They look great. With 60 watt bulbs, they give off a small amount of light. Good mood lighting that does not overpower the TV. 100 or 150 watt bulbs would light the room nicely. After a quick look over the instructions it took 10 minutes to assemble each. Quality is decent. They sit on carpet and i am not worried about them falling over. Make sure they are not too tall for where your putting them. They sit a couple inches taller then my 70" LED on a normal TV stand. Would recommend to anyone. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Boost16

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Lamp with Taste
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is really off of the beaten path of lamps. Very happy with the purchase and will probably buy a second at some point. I have no problem reading by its light with a 100 watt bulb in at night. No regrets at all. I wouldn't use it to store books on, but a couple of cool knick knacks can really make it an elegant lamp. It looks like it would cost more than $100, not less.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Works for ambient lighting in a non-formal area
customer_reviews.text: Not a $500 piece of furniture, but works well for providing ambient lighting in my office/den. Liked it well enough that I bought a second one. Would not be satisfactory as reading light. Annoyances: (a) cord should be black, not clear as provided; (b) should be a better way of concealing cord than tying it with two plastic cable ties; (c) if you're going to do it with cable ties, the one's provided should at least work. Those provided with first lamp were stripped and would not hold.
customer_reviews.author: J Bob Shu

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable for price -- not worlds most stable lamp
customer_reviews.text: These look lovely, and we have had ours for over a year. Just do not expect these to be sturdy. They are rather flimsy and do not stand firm. The plywood is rather lightweight and the lamps (we bought two) are somewhat off center. So just don't be surprised. The "wood" has a bendy feel and wobbles. But decent price so you can over look a lot for aesthetics.
customer_reviews.author: SDF

customer_reviews.title: Glad no one will be looking at them
customer_reviews.text: Lamp went together well enough. The parts are cheap and the cut of the posts is actually not square. If one looks at it directly you can notice certain pegs are actually crooked. The lamp itself is serviceable but looks moderately cheap. Bought these for the guest bedroom and office... Glad no one will be looking at them.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this light for our purpose
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with this product. I didn't expect it would come in such a small box which told me it had to be put together. I bought 2 for my daughter's apartment and was surprised when she called to tell me she put both of them together by herself. They are perfect for her use as a side light to her desk and her roommates desk at college. They are not overwhelming bright but the light is sufficient for this purpose. The shelves are helpful to both of them for their college books and knick-knacks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works until it doesn't, which is soon.
customer_reviews.text: We bought one in 2014, which still works great. Bought a second one in 2016 and 4 months ago, it up and stopped working. It's not the bulb but the light kit. Now it's useless as a lamp. :/
customer_reviews.author: Raven Oak

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but I wish I could hide the wire
customer_reviews.text: Looks great; wish I could hide the bulb ballast wire somehow instead of it just running along the side of one of the legs. Would’ve been 5 stars if it didn’t have some scratches when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: LAV

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp - Assembly required.
customer_reviews.text: Decent little lamp. Looks nice and uses good materials. Be warned, you need to assemble this item. It comes in a small box full of sticks and screws. Fortunately, it doesn't take too long and is not terribly complicated if you have some basic mechanical aptitude. The directions list items by letter and basic description, but the items have no corresponding letter markings. If you really rely on assembly directions to spell out every little detail for you, (Yes, I am speaking to you IKEA people ;) ) you may fight though the assembly on this one. I trust that most folks could probably get it right in the end.
customer_reviews.author: edwin johnston

customer_reviews.title: UNIQUE AND BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter's college apartment. She absolutely loves it! It's beautiful and looks much more expensive. She says it gives plenty of light and that she loves the shelves since it gives her a place to display her sorority memorabilia. No one at school has the same lamp; she loves showing it off. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and a great bargain.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. It's a great value and it looks great. It doesn't necessarily give off a lot of light and the shelves are definitely decorative, so don't try to put anything heavy on them. I put it together myself, which means it was pretty easy to do... not without some effort, but definitely doable. I love it and would buy it again in a minute if I had more space.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncust

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together, but doesn't feel all that sturdy (especially when placed on carpet). I put some heavier books on the bottom shelf and that seemed to stabilize it more!
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Benavidez

customer_reviews.title: Lamp for any empty corner
customer_reviews.text: First one was missing quit a few parts, but after notifying, I was sent another and this one had a few extra parts lol. It is not a high quality lamp, but the price is indicative of that. However, it does function as stated. And if I had not had to return the first one, would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: J. Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Just like the pic
customer_reviews.text: They packed it really well & it arrived as promised. It was not quite so easy to put together, but is pretty just like the pic. Wood is a little flimsy & don't know how much each shelf will hold.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, broken chain pull
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is attractive, solid, and pretty easy to assemble. However, like at least one other reviewer, I had a problem with the chain pull -- it broke after 1 day (perhaps 5 pulls). I emailed the manufacturer and they shipped a free replacement socket/chain in less than a day. Hopefully it'll work better. In the meantime, I'm giving it 3 stars since at least one other reviewer reported a similar problem (but also got good service and found the replacement part better).
customer_reviews.author: BB in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Nice floor lamp
customer_reviews.text: Really nice floor lamp. Easy to put together. Took 15 minutes. Looks great in my guest bedroom. Good quality lamp. I purchased as open box great deal. I may buy another one for my family room.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my living room
customer_reviews.text: It got only 4 stars because it has slightly cheap/flimsy components. It comes disassembled but if the screws are tightened properly, it is pretty solid. The shape goes with my living room very well.
customer_reviews.author: TBC Titan

customer_reviews.title: Suited for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is constructed from wood, pressed-board, plastic and cloth. The power cord is strapped to one of the uprights using cable ties. The manufacturer did a good job of making it look like it has a traditional lacquer finish. Considering the materials and the price, it is well constructed. For some, it would not be dressy enough for their living room. But it was perfect for my application, a floor lamp in my Asian-motif master bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: CrankyToday

customer_reviews.title: Designer from a distance, Decent up close.
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are easy to assemble - you'll need only a Phillips (+) screwdriver for a small portion of the build process. This isn't a precision instrument - the wood column's edge's won't perfectly align with the shelves, however;they're pretty darn close. You'll notice the discrepancy when you build the lamp, but you'll soon forget about it and virtually no one will notice. Assembled, the lamp looks great from a distance of 4 feet or more. Is it a stellar buy? No. Is the quality spectacular? No, the fit and finish is mediocre. Is it a decent value compared to other products? Sure.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Not worth what you pay.
customer_reviews.text: This item is very easy to assemble, and works very nicely. However, the wood and finish began to peel during assembly, the hardware was low quality, and I ended up using my own cable ties because the ones included broke. If I'd known this is what I'd be receiving, I would not have paid more that $40 for it, this item is well overpriced for the quality you get.
customer_reviews.author: Simson918

customer_reviews.title: Was easily to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Was easily to assemble, my only issue is that the zip ties that were included to secure the cord so it wouldn't necessarily be seen easily, were not big enough and I had to hunt for black twist ties so the light colored cord could not easily be seen as the cord hanging without being secured looks ugly. Overall exactly what I wanted other than the zip tie issue.
customer_reviews.author: skyylab

customer_reviews.title: Bright accessory to your room. Lights up a medium-large room easily.
customer_reviews.text: Its super cool addition to the living room. Bright lighting and lights a medium-large size room with no issues. We bought a florescent white bulb in color, not yellow. It is pretty good. The shelves are spacious and pretty durable. Height on the shelves is nearly 1.5 ft. Sturdy legs, and nice white cloth screen. Easy to assemble. Definitely a good decoration to your room.
customer_reviews.author: Srikanth Yerraguntla

customer_reviews.title: check bag of screws carefully
customer_reviews.text: the lamp looks beautiful, but it was missing 2 of the double sided screws needed to put it together. So it is sort of rigged it work. Not as stable as it should be. Also there were no wire ties, no big deal I had my own.
customer_reviews.author: lwood

customer_reviews.title: Package was incomplete but was resolved. Nice light.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived missing one of the poles and full assembly could not be completed. Spoke to customer service and received the missing part about a week later. Light looks and works as expected. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingGal8

customer_reviews.title: it also looks very nice and the light is bright
customer_reviews.text: I have a small room and this worked perfecting to save space and use as a light but also a bookshelf, it also looks very nice and the light is bright
customer_reviews.author: Monument

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and solid lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and solid lamp. Looked questionable on opening because of all the parts. I thought it would not be solid on first observation but once put together this is a nice solid lamp with guides to hide the power cord sufficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I love this floor lamp. It was easy to put together. Light weight, looks nice, and puts out a good amount of light ... not to bright though. And it looks good with or w/out things on the shelf's.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps, just like they look here.
customer_reviews.text: These lamps look just as pictured if not better in real life. They come completely unassembled, but are easy to do if you follow the simple instructions. Takes maybe 10 minutes each. The only thing that would make them better would be if they were three-way fixtures. The fabric in the shades is a cream color which makes harsh fluorescent bulbs give off a warm light that looks just like a warm white incandescent bulb. It's a well-made lamp that looks more expensive than it is. I bought 1, and then after getting it bought 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble (from someone who is not too handy)
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble (from someone who is not too handy). Fits perfectly in a small corner next to my desk and is just what I was looking for. I have a small label printer that fits on the second shelf which frees up room on my desk. The light is not overly bright, and that is what I wanted as I have ceiling fan light when I need brightness. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Susan P

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this lamp for my office and it is perfect. It looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp for my office and it is perfect. It looks great. the quality is decent, and the light is more than adequate for the room. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nick W

customer_reviews.title: The assembly instructions were useless, but worked great once I threw them away
customer_reviews.text: It is what I was looking for. The assembly instructions were useless, but worked great once I threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, but manufacturer didn't send us all the parts..
customer_reviews.text: I was short two hollow rod screws when I was assembling the lamp. Amazon wanted me to ship the entire lamp back instead of just sending me two screws. I ended up making it work by jamming toothpicks in the hole instead.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Pain to put together but nice when done
customer_reviews.text: Once it's set up, it works perfectly and doesn't look cheap. But be warned-- it comes in an impossibly small box and tons of pieces with horrible instructions so you will have Ikea nightmare flashbacks when you see it. But, despite the worst instructions, once you figure it out, it's easy to set up and no missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: DLosangeles

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. If looks great in my family room in the corner. Can't wait to get some cute pic frames to put on the shelves. The only thing I was not crazy about was you can kind of see the cord but I'm real picky with cords showing. Other then that's it's a great lamp, and I'm very happy with it. Took my husband about 30-45 min to put together and he didn't complain which is always a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: I like the minimalist look of this lamp and it works fine. But it's pretty thin and and I wouldn't trust storing anything heavy on it. The pictures make it look higher quality than it is. It's a good lamp, but probably not worth the $60 I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Cade Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect and excellent product/services. - Cheap and valued - Efficient delivery time - Good quality - Accurate online product descriptive - Good customer service - I recommend to anyone, worth buying
customer_reviews.author: Mo-Mo

customer_reviews.title: Super solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Super solid construction, easy to assemble. The plastic light cover dents easily and came with some dings from the shipping, but I was able to position them towards the wall and aren't visible. I end up stacking things on this all the time. Super handy and the chain pull is like military-grade awesome. The cord management that came with it was built for ants.
customer_reviews.author: AcornPersonage

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are written terribly, but luckily the parts are pretty self explanatory. It's sturdy and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lib

customer_reviews.title: Love this light!  Adds to the decor of the room, and practical light as well.
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. Attractive in my living, and adds some night lighting as well. Not much fun to put together, but managed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Graham

customer_reviews.title: Love the Product But Missing Part!
customer_reviews.text: I loved that it came the same day that I ordered it and it had a very classy look. It also provides a nice level of additional light to my living room. However, the manufacturer sent some of the wrong pieces so I had to turn the light in a way that hides the missing piece.
customer_reviews.author: Eby

customer_reviews.title: Great Office Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I didn't give it 5 stars because it seemed a little confusing to put together, and requires tools, which I didn't have. Luckily, I found someone at the office with a screw driver, and got it together in about 30 minutes, I guess. I have it in a corner of my office and it looks very nice. The shelves are convenient for nick nacks or other office things you want to show off.
customer_reviews.author: MelJoh

customer_reviews.title: Unique Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Just assembled it today and it looks great. Love the oriental llok and shelves !
customer_reviews.author: Lyn S

customer_reviews.title: Solid stand with soft light - a little TV glare is only issue
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and a flat LED bulb at same time. Young son tripped over our old torch light too many times and broke it at the base. This is much more solid than the old single pole torch lamp and the light from it is much softer. Still causes a bit of glare on the TV though. Looks great, easy to assemble, solid piece of hardware.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: 2 in 1 product, so efficient and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for putting various things on the shelves, while also saving space for a lamp. It's a 2 in 1 product so its very efficient
customer_reviews.author: Syed Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: it looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: A bit flimsy. The shade does block out a lot of the light, so it isn't very bright anymore. If you need more light, get something with a thinner shade. Otherwise, it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: J. DANG

customer_reviews.title: Quick Set up and Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: Light and no hard to set it up alone. Came in a tight little box with no room for it to get damaged. You just need a screwdriver. Took me about ten minutes.. will use the shelves for my worldly souvenirs.
customer_reviews.author: ActiveMI

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pain to put together, but does the job once it is.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have gotten one with filigree or some decoration on the lamp shade. The shelves are nice to have and ended up keeping it. The light isn't very bright, not good for reading, but works for warm, ambiance lighting.

customer_reviews.title: but don't get too close - looks a little shoddy and not very sturdy, but for the price it is okay
customer_reviews.text: It is attractive enough, but don't get too close - looks a little shoddy and not very sturdy, but for the price it is okay.
customer_reviews.author: JJones

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: When I put my black lamp together, the light didn't turn on. Hence, I called Adesso, and they sent me a new socket attached to a shelf as a replacement. Even though I said I needed a black colored shelf, they sent me a brown one. Well, I guess I'll have to just paint it. Ugh! Other than that, I like the lamp and will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: T. C. Coxon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lamp. Came just as pictured. Very easy to assemble. Probably not for households with small kids, because it could easily tip.
customer_reviews.author: W.T.

customer_reviews.title: This product looks nice, but it cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp, carefully put it together, yet the lamp doesn't work. Further review reading shows this to be a common problem. This product looks nice, but it cheaply made. I'm dreading the headache with customer service. Will adjust review depending on CS
customer_reviews.author: Jaitt

customer_reviews.title: Not the best instructions, but easy assembly and nice finished product
customer_reviews.text: Took me a few minutes to read the directions, they are written in the most clear way, but the actual assembly was pretty easy and the finished product looks great--especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Audra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is exactly what I was looking for. I wanted a lamp that had shelves so that I could find space for some family photos. These work perfectly for 5x7 or 4x6 photos. The shade is so simple and gives off great light. It is also easy to put together. So glad I made this purchase. It also takes up very little space.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzmom

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. we bought 2 of these and fitted ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. we bought 2 of these and fitted them with 100W equivalent fluorescent bulbs. the products are classy, easy to assemble and look great! We haven't by choice loaded them with heavy items.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and great for holding my travel souvenirs.
customer_reviews.author: Lousing

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm glow, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I knew what I was buying since I ordered one at work a few years ago. Easy to assemble (about 20 minutes) and looks great in any room. The shade casts a nice warm glow, even if the bulb is a little whiter than a warm soft white. The extra shelf space for toys or nick-nacks (or is it knick-knacks?) is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Boulder

customer_reviews.title: Nice but cheap
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Looks as expected. It's a cheaply made. I am not sure it's worth its money; nevertheless, it does give a soft light and has shelving.
customer_reviews.author: jphys

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble and pretty sturdy worked out perfectly for the small amount of space i had
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Hotchkiss

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this lamp, I have had it in my living room for about a year now. It arrived in perfect condition and was very easy to put together. I have also had no issues with it in the last year, it has done well when paired with an LED light bulb such as a philips hue. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Installation was fairly easy.. only downside is that its not stable ...
customer_reviews.text: Installation was fairly easy.. only downside is that its not stable at the bottom even with a heavy object
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect extra light with three extra shelves
customer_reviews.text: Perfect extra light with three extra shelves. This unit takes one high wattage light bulb. It was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Patti B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accent to my living room
customer_reviews.text: Perfect accent to my living room, and a nice way to keep my router tucked away where no one can see it. This is a nice piece, I wouldn't consider it very sturdy, this works for me since its up against a corner and one of the dogs can't just accidentally knock it over.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: Adesso 3138-01 Wright 63 In. Floor Lamp - Smart Switch Compatible Light Fixtures with Two Storage Shelves. Lighting Accessories
product_meta.description: Have it all with high style and multi-function. The Wright shelf floor lamp feature a black walnut wood open box frame with two additional display/storage shelves, making it a handy addition to the living/media room, den, office, or bedroom. The collapsible poly/cotton shade diffuses light from a 150 Watt incandescent or equivalent bulb. The lamp has on/off functionality with a metal ball accented pull chain switch. This lamp has a clear cord and is smart outlet compatible. Bulb is not included. All Adesso lighting products are either UL listed or ETL listed, meaning it has been tested and approved to meet the government-regulated safety standards for the USA. When shopping for lighting products, we recommend to always look for the UL or ETL marks to ensure you are purchasing lighting that has been tested for safety standards by a 3rd party testing lab. Unfortunately, not all lighting products in the marketplace have been through 3rd party safety testing.
feature_bullets: High Performance Floor Lamp: home furnishing lamp comes with a clear cord and collapsible poly/cotton shade to diffuse light for creating great ambiance. Highly functional wall lamp is smart switch compatible that allows easy controlling

Multi-Purpose Lighting Fixture: flooring lamp comes with two added display/storage shelves — making it spacious as well as functional. Home lighting fixture can be used to display elegant showpieces or accessories on the shelves

Home Improvement Accessory: stylish multi-purpose floor lamp is a versatile decor accessory. Can be placed in the living room, bedroom, office, or personal den to enhance interiors by lighting up the premises
Durability: trendy and contemporary lighting lamp is secured by a wooden open box frame. With fine polish and sturdy construction, decorative lamp would invigorate your decor effectively

Specifications: floor lamp comes in black wall nut color and is 63 in. tall with 10.25 in. square W x D. With 10.25 in. base, light fixture stands firmly on floorings. Lamp shade measures 14.25 in. (h) with 8.5 in. square

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars728 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
